distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for net-snmp fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed:

- CVE-2018-18065: _set_key in agent/helpers/table_container.c had a NULL Pointer Exception bug that can be used by an authenticated attacker to remotely cause the instance to crash via a crafted UDP packet, resulting in Denial of Service. (bsc#1111122)

Non-security issues fixed:

- swintst_rpm: Protect against unspecified Group name (bsc#1102775)
- Add tsm and tlstm MIBs and the USM security module. (bsc#1081164)
- Fix agentx freezing on timeout (bsc#1027353)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: _set_key in agent/helpers/table_container.c in Net-SNMP before 5.8 has a NULL Pointer Exception bug that can be used by an authenticated attacker to remotely cause the instance to crash via a crafted UDP packet, resulting in Denial of Service.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
